text:
Additional District Judge-II, M. Ravindran, on Wednesday sentenced a man to undergo life imprisonment for murdering a 21-year-old youth in 2014.

Viji of Patta Kovil was found murdered with his face smashed near a Tasmac outlet at Ananda Bridge in January, 2014. Inquiries with Jeeva, a history-sheeter,

revealed that he was a friend of Viji.

He killed Viji over a drunken brawl.

The judge imposed a fine of Rs. 5,000 too on him.
title: Life imprisonment
